ygData.subject: Re: Hey Harmonic, time to press that optional download again!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The crystal ball tells me much - first of all, this zone is not yet complete.  Second, it appears full of rats, bats, beetles and kobolds, so I wonder
ygData.messageBody:
At 06:02 PM 2/11/00 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Michal Hobson" <given@...>
>
>In case no one has tried today to use the optional patch button, give it a
>push! It seems that Verant has uploaded Paineel onto the patch server. I
>don't know what their plans were for this area, but I'm assuming its for
>upper levels.


The crystal ball tells me much - first of all, this zone is not yet
complete. Second, it appears full of rats, bats, beetles and kobolds, so I
wonder about the "high level" concept - methinks it is actually for
low-level necros and such. Third, any queries as to the nature of my
crystal ball shall be ignored ;) It wouldn't be a mystery if I told you,
now would it?

Talies the Wanderer
